column1: Tolkien compliments Edith for her splendid letters while calling himself a "pig" for not writing more often.<ref group="notes">He had become engaged to her the prior year.</ref>  He discusses his time training at the [[Oxford University
column2: University]] Officer's Training Corps while attending his final year as an undergraduate at Oxford. He mentions a story he is working on, ''[[The Story of Kullervo]]''.<ref group="notes">It was never finished.</ref>
